title: Low Priority Queue Resetting?
body: I've been waiting for over an hour to try to play. It resets back to the full 20 minute duration every 2 or 3 minutes and it's infuriating. I've tried restarting the client, switching tabs, etc. [another example](https://image.prntscr.com/image/mikxM5sRSSOw8CnerrX_LQ.png)

replies.body:
Man that issue can get infuriating really quick for sure. Most of the time the timer resets due to some kind of hiccup in your connection, so the timer actually stops ticking and it looks like it reset =\

I'm glad you finally got it worked out. If it happens again be sure to try out an ethernet connection to be sure it's as stable as possible, but I would also try adjusting your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 to get a clearer connection route as well.
It's happening with me RN, ill wait it out and see{{item:3070}}
nvm i have been released from this hell
